ygData.subject: Re: Charred Items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... them ... I really don t know where the EXG is. I spent over 50 hours in Sol A and have never even SEEN that damn robot. I *think* she s in the pit. She s
ygData.messageBody:
> Wow just what I needed.. I just picked up the Boots and Gauntlets (had
them
> on the first kill) and was looking for the BP. I don't think I've seen the
> Clockwork EXG though, where does it spawn?? (I've only been in Soulesk A
> for a day)..

I really don't know where the EXG is. I spent over 50 hours in Sol A and
have never even SEEN that damn robot. I *think* she's in the pit. She's not
really a rare spawn, kinda like Drelzna (like a 50-50 chance or something).
But she's a larger-than-the-rest female robot. Or just ask if someone's
camping her and run around till you find them, then you'll know where she's
supposed to be. :)

Btw, I got my bp through trade, I gave up on trying to find her... stupid
gnomes... (I traded an exec hood for it).

Dravith Vandre'i
